level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary repeal of section, see ยง 802 (a) of the Omnibus Criminal Justice Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 1994 (D.C. Act 10-255, June 22, 1994, 41 DCR 4286).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-151
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-151, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 24-221.01.
